name: baseval

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(c0, nat1))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(nat1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(c0, nat1))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(nat1))

|- wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(c0, nat1))
-| wcel(c0, universe)

comment: Value of the base set extractor. (Normally it is preferred to work with ` ( Base `` ndx ) ` rather than the hard-coded ` 1 ` in order to make structure theorems portable. This is an example of how to obtain it when needed.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Sep-2011.)
